snippet: Dozens of hard-line Salafist Muslims attacked a hotel in Sidi Bouzid, the birthplace of Tunisia’s revolution, because it was serving alcohol, the hotel’s owner said Tuesday.
abstract: Dozens of hard-line Salafist Muslims attack a hotel in Sidi Bouzid, the birthplace of Tunisia’s revolution, because it was serving alcohol.
lead_paragraph: Dozens of hard-line Salafist Muslims attacked a hotel in Sidi Bouzid, the birthplace of Tunisia’s revolution, because it was serving alcohol, the hotel’s owner said Tuesday.

headline.seo: Tunisian Hotel Ransacked for Serving Alcohol
headline.main: Tunisia: Salafist Muslims Ransack Hotel for Serving Alcohol
headline.print_headline: Tunisia: Salafist Muslims Ransack Hotel For Serving Alcohol, Owner Says
